attributes.action: Build the new secondary school in Lyde Green, South Gloucestershire for 2024
attributes.additional_details: I have contacted Chris Skidmore and Rachael Hunt to no avail.  My local community group have also been asking for updates and answers as I would like an update to parents in the form of a meeting.  I need the government to step in as this is getting nowhere.
attributes.background: I would like the government to push for this school to be built as all local secondary schools were oversubscribed this year and we need this school in place for 2024 leavers.

rejection.details:
You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors

You can also petition your local council here: https://council.southglos.gov.uk/mgEPetitionListDisplay.aspx
